verbs.description: [ARG0: The Pentagon] [ARGM-TMP: on Thursday] [V: ratcheted] up [ARG1: rhetoric about China 's militarization of islands in the South China Sea] , [ARGM-TMP: even as the Trump administration presses China for cooperation on North Korea] .

The Pentagon on Thursday ratcheted up rhetoric about China 's militarization of islands in the South China Sea , even as [ARG0: the Trump administration] [V: presses] [ARG1: China] [ARG2: for cooperation on North Korea] .
